none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2022-01-devious-ones/extracted/Devious Ones/02 Bip (Bust You In The Lip)
media/user/SCRAPE/test/2022-01-devious-ones/extracted/Devious Ones/07 Some Of Us Are Still Here

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on January 23, 2022 Description from Terminal Escape:
This tape is everything that yesterday's ABORTION REELS is not. Snappy, high energy garage punk - syrupy sweet and catchy as all hell. Like MOTT THE HOOPLE on a SOVIETTES bender, this Detroit outfit is shamelessly infectious - like top down with the wind in your hair and no one around for miles so you can sing along at volume kind of infectious. DEVIOUS ONES
